title: SP6 "Episode of Luffy: Adventure on Hand Island"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Rufi – Hando Airando no Bōken" (Japanese:エピソードオブルフィ ～ハンドアイランドの冒険～) Hiroyuki Morita, Mitsuru Hongo Yasuyuki Tsutsumi December 15, 2012(2012-12-15) 102 minutes

SP6 "Episode of Luffy: Adventure on Hand Island"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Rufi – Hando Airando no Bōken" (Japanese:エピソードオブルフィ ～ハンドアイランドの冒険～) Hiroyuki Morita, Mitsuru Hongo Yasuyuki Tsutsumi December 15, 2012(2012-12-15) 102 minutes

An original story with flashback sequences remaking Luffy's history with Shanks and first encounter withCoby.[n 3]Luffy befriends wax sculptorDiegoand helps free his sonRegis, who has been imprisoned by corrupt Marine CommodoreBilić.
